name: John Digweed
description: '''Thomas John Digweed''' (born April 1967) is a British DJ and record producer. As well as achieving success as a solo act, he has collaborated with [[Sasha (DJ)|Sasha]] as [[Sasha & John Digweed]], and with [[Nick Muir]] as [[Bedrock (producers)|Bedrock]]. Digweed was voted as No. 1 DJ in [[DJ Mag]] in 2001.
